Row.Text: To achieve a [COLOR:ResGoldLabelCS]RICHES[ENDCOLOR] victory, you must accomplish 2 major milestones at the same time:
Earn at least {1_earning_goal} [Icon_Gold] Gold over the course of the entire game.
Have at least {1_stockpile_goal} [Icon_Gold] Gold stockpiled in your treasury.
Earn at least {1_earning_goal} [Icon_Gold] gold over the course of the entire game. This player has earned {2_current_earnings} [Icon_Gold] gold.

Have at least {1_stockpile_goal} [Icon_Gold] gold stockpiled in your treasury. This player currently has {2_current_stockpile} [Icon_Gold] gold. This objective can be lost if gold is removed from the treasury.

To achieve a [COLOR:DiplomaticLabelCS]CHARISMA[ENDCOLOR] victory, you must recruit {1_recruitment_requirement} [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People over the course of the game. Great Prophets and Comandante Generals are not counted towards this goal, but other modded great people are.
Earn {1_recruitment_goal} [Icon_GreatPerson] great people over the course of the entire game. This player has earned {2_current_recruitment} [Icon_GreatPerson] great people.
To achieve a [COLOR:ResCultureLabelCS]JOYOUS[ENDCOLOR] victory, you must accomplish 2 major milestones at the same time:
Have the highest [Icon_Amenities] amenity per [Icon_Citizen] citizen ratio in your empire for a total of {1_total_turns_needed} turns.

Have the highest [Icon_Amenities] amenity per [Icon_Citizen] citizen ratio in your empire for {1_concurrent_turns_needed} turns in a row. This streak will be reset every time a different civilization has a higher ratio.
Have the highest [Icon_Amenities] amenity per [Icon_Citizen] citizen ratio for a total of {1_total_turns_needed} turns. This player has accomplished this for a total of {2_total_current} turns.
Have the highest [Icon_Amenities] amenity per [Icon_Citizen] citizen ratio for a total of {1_concurrent_turns_needed} turns in a row. This player's current streak is {2_concurrent_current} turns.

To achieve a [COLOR:DiplomaticLabelCS]MEGALOPOLIS[ENDCOLOR] victory, you must occupy at least {1_cities_required} cities, each with a population of at least {2_required_population} [Icon_Citizen] citizens.
Occupy {1_cities_required} cities, each with a population of at least {2_required_population} [Icon_Citizen] citizens. This player has {3_current_recruitment} cities with the required population.
